channel.title: change-replication-filter on TY KIM devLog
channel.description: Recent content in change-replication-filter on TY KIM devLog

item.title: Change Replication Filter
item.description: CHANGE REPLICATION FILTER sets one or more replication filtering rules on the slave in the same way as starting the slave mysqld with replication filtering options such as –replicate-do-db or –replicate-wild-ignore-table.
